column5: Made a run to Guelph to visit Anna in hospital this morning.  Was there early enough to get in an hour's fishing before the visit. Only hit 2 pools but I'm happy with the results.    Nothing huge but still fun. Next week I'll hit a couple of different pools.
Great going Bruce Hope your daughter's doing fine!!! Thanks for sharing Jacques
That smallmouth in the second pic is real green! almost like a largie
Better to be out & catch small ones, then not going at all, nice pictures Richard
your net in the background almost looks like its made of chain link...  good on ya

"Made a run to Guelph to visit Anna in hospital this morning. Was there early enough to get in an hour's fishing before the visit. Only hit 2 pools but I'm happy with the results."  Nothing like centering the mind with some fishing before taking on the serious things in life..  Prayers for Anna from London.
Nice man!  First week of august is when things usually really start to pick up in the rivers here in guelph for bass blastin!!  I find yellow anything seems to be key to enticing the bigger fellas!
I managed a couple three pounders just up river from where you were in that second picture.  There are some hogs in there for sure
